metadata.title: Pins that cannot be used as output pins when using A/D converters

sections.content:
Question:
For Pins that cannot be used as output pins when using A/D converters, can they be used as output pins when the output voltage of the corresponding pin is fixed at High level or Low level?
Answer:
This pin can be used as an output pin only when the output voltage is fixed. (including handling of unused pins)
Suitable Products
RX Family
